name: Heavy Truck Drive: Offroad Dri
description:
Heavy Truck Drive: Offroad Driving is not an easy task but an adventurous task to get more fun of heavy vehicle games. You can explore more offroad hilly mountain tracks in this USA truck simulation. The big truck trailers will have marvelous physics control to make a driving adventure more fantastic & more adorable. This offroad truck driving will give you entertainment of both grand truck driving and big truck parking simulator
Features:-
• Arrange different camera angle for user-friendly view
• Challenging and outstanding real 3d environment
• Competitive and unique missions to achieve
• Easy manual UI -euro truck simulator
• Realistic truck sound
